description: Deletes the specified alarms. You can delete up to 100 alarms in one operation.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1562.001 - Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Deleting alarms can be part of a broader strategy to destroy or disrupt data by removing key monitoring and alert mechanisms.
By deleting alarms, an attacker can effectively stop the alerting service from functioning as expected, similar to stopping a service
Deleting alarms can be seen as removing indicators of potential issues or past activities, which is a broader form of indicator removal than just file deletion.

securityImplications: Attackers might use DeleteAlarms to disable critical CloudWatch alerts, undermining AWS environment monitoring
